arts.sum: Bayern Munich face their first big test of the Club World Cup when they play Argentinian giants Boca Juniors.

Bayern Munich romped to a 10-0 win over Auckland in matchday one as they asserted their dominance to put in a big score. Boca were pegged back by Benfica to share the spoils last time out, and their ...
